DOC.brief_summary: To determine effectiveness safety sequential therapy Tri-Luma® Cream series Glycolic Acid peel treatment moderate severe melasma .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Therapy With Tri-Luma® Cream Sequence With Glycolic Acid Peels Melasma
DOC.detailed_description: To determine efficacy safety sequential therapy Fluocinolone acetonide 0.01 % , Hydroquinone 4 % Tretinoin 0.05 % , series Glycolic Acid peel treatment moderate severe melasma .
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnose moderate severe melasma Subjects treatment dermatologic condition , may interfere safe evaluation study combination ( e.g . eczema , psoriasis , severe sundamage , dermatitis ) Subjects diagnosis skin cancer ( BCE , SCC , Melanoma ) area treat
